message.content: {"id": "17703", "title": "Bug 17703 - Edit/Add Task action should use Workbench dialog as Java Editor does", "description": "When selecting a CU in the packages view and executing the File -> Add Task action, a different dialog is displayed compared to executing the action from the Java editor's ruler context menu.", "OB": "When selecting a CU in the packages view and executing the File -> Add Task action, a different dialog is displayed compared to executing the action from the Java editor's ruler context menu.", "EB": "The Edit/Add Task action should use the same dialog as the Java editor does in both cases.", "SR": "Ensure that the Edit/Add Task action uses the Workbench dialog consistently, regardless of whether it is executed from the packages view or from the Java editor's ruler context menu."}
